name: Who's Jenna
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

When Jonathan Burke, a financial advisor, starts dating Jenna Casey, an aspiring lawyer, his world is turned upside down when his friends are convinced she is a famous adult film star. Not only does Johnathan have to deal with his friends claim, but his boss, Jenna's brother-in-law and connected to the mob, decides to black-mail him!
about_the_game: When Jonathan Burke, a financial advisor, starts dating Jenna Casey, an aspiring lawyer, his world is turned upside down when his friends are convinced she is a famous adult film star. Not only does Johnathan have to deal with his friends claim, but his boss, Jenna's brother-in-law and connected to the mob, decides to black-mail him!
short_description: What if your wife used to be a famous porn star? And what happens when your friends find out?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
